tool.name: pRESTO Partition
tool.command: ln -s '$fastq_in' in.fastq && SplitSeq.py group -s in.fastq -f '$field' --num '$threshold' --outname=tmp_group && mv './tmp_group_under-${threshold}.fastq' '$lower_out' && mv './tmp_group_atleast-${threshold}.fastq' '$upper_out'

param.name: fastq_in
param.label: Input FASTQ file
param.help: FASTQ file of sequences with barcodes/UMIs in an annotation.

param.name: field
param.label: Annotation Field
param.help: Name of the numeric annotation field to partition by.

param.name: threshold
param.label: Threshold
param.help: Numeric threshold. File will be partitions be into n < threshold and n >= threshold.
